name: Glossy Mega Menu
author: GlossyIt

sections.description: Glossy Mega Menu is an innovative WordPress plugin designed to enhance your website\’s navigation by enabling you to build fully customizable mega menus with Elementor. With this plugin, you can create engaging and dynamic menus that suit your brand\’s style. It also includes a powerful header and footer builder, offering you the freedom to design your site\’s top and bottom sections directly within Elementor, ensuring a seamless and cohesive design experience across your entire website.
sections.installation:
Download glossy-mega-menu.zip
Unzip & Upload the glossy-mega-menu folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the glossy-mega-menu from plugins.

short_description: Glossy Mega Menu is a WordPress plugin for creating stunning mega menus with Elementor, including a header and footer builder for design flexibility.
